cvb-website/.README.md:
# Chattahoochee Valley Beekeepers Website

A modern, SEO-optimized website for the Chattahoochee Valley Beekeepers Association in Columbus, Georgia.

## Getting Started

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
```

## Deployment

```bash
npm run build
npm run start
```

## Features

- SEO optimized for local search
- Mobile responsive design
- Event calendar with JSON support
- News/updates system
- Contact forms
- Structured data for Google

## Domain

This site is designed for deployment to cvbeeks.org
